title: Quest 2 Is Getting A $100 Price Increase! Is It Still Worth It?
description:
In a shock announcement, Meta are increasing the price of the Quest 2 headset by $100 / £100 starting from the 1st August!

Check out the official announcement from Meta here;
https://www.oculus.com/blog/meta-quest-2-pricing-changes

Let me know what you think of the Quest 2 price increase in the comments below?

Thanks for watching []-)
